response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This unique item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its exceptional quality and craftsmanship, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to acquire this masterpiece at a special price of $15,000. I trust this opportunity will meet your needs and exceed your expectations.
